.class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit Int32Collection extends System.Windows.Freezable implements class System.Collections.Generic.ICollection`1<int32>, class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<int32>, class System.Collections.Generic.IList`1<int32>, class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Collections.IList, class System.IFormattable

Docs.summary: Represents a collection of <xref:System.Int32> values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Members of this class behave exactly as described by the , , and documentation, except that this implementation throws an if you attempt to insert `null` into the collection. **Freezable Features:** Because it inherits from the class, the Int32Collection class provides several special features: Int32Collection objects can be declared as , shared among multiple objects, made read-only to improve performance, cloned, and made thread-safe. For more information about the different features provided by objects, see the [Freezable Objects Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md). ## XAML Attribute Usage 0 ## XAML Values *oneOrMoreKInt32Values* One or more values, with each pair delimited by a single comma and/or one or more spaces: *[delimeter* *]\** For example, `"5 10 43"` and `"5,10,43"` are both valid.

Docs.summary: Creates a modifiable clone of this , making deep copies of this object's values. When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
